channel.title: Cmd error when run, need help ASAP
channel.description:
Hey, I restarted my server today and then It give's me an error for like 5 seconds, then exits and open's up again, my server is currently offline, due to this issue. I need help ASAP!
Loaded clipmap in 89ms. [12/11/11 3:19 PM]: This edition of Heart Broken is made by Ben. Base hybird pvp /Downscape/which now makes Heart Broken! [12/11/11 3:19 PM]: Starting up Heart Broken [12/11/11 3:19 PM]: Exception in thread "main" [12/11/11 3:19 PM]: java.net.Bind Exception: Address already in use: bind [12/11/11 3:19 PM]: at sun.nio.ch.Net.bind(Native Method) [12/11/11 3:19 PM]: at sun.nio.ch.ServerSocketChannelImpl.bind(ServerSocketC hannelImpl.java:126) [12/11/11 3:19 PM]: at sun.nio.ch.ServerSocketAdaptor.bind(ServerSocketAdapt or.java:59) [12/11/11 3:19 PM]: at org.apache.mina.transport.socket.nio.SocketAcceptor.r egisterNew(SocketAcceptor.java:363) [12/11/11 3:19 PM]: at org.apache.mina.transport.socket.nio.SocketAcceptor.a ccess$800(SocketAcceptor.java:55) [12/11/11 3:19 PM]: at org.apache.mina.transport.socket.nio.SocketAcceptor$W orker.run(SocketAcceptor.java:222) [12/11/11 3:19 PM]: at org.apache.mina.util.NamePreservingRunnable.run(NameP reservingRunnable.java:51) [12/11/11 3:19 PM]: at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:662) Press any key to continue . . .

item.title: Cmd error when run, need help ASAP
item.dc:creator: @whackatre Whackatre
item.description:
@whackatre wrote:

You already have something running on that port.

Read full topic
